biotools.summary: A parallel acceleration tool for classical frequent subgraph mining algorithm. The core idea is to employ parallel techniques to parallelize extension tasks, so as to reduce computation time. On the other hand, multi-node strategy is employed to solve the problem of memory constraints.

bioschemas.name: cmFSM
